title: My suspension time is not going down
body: My account has been suspended for 14 days and i understand why. The first day i got suspended it said i had 14 days left. it is now about 6 days after the ban and it still says 14 days left. I dont know why.

replies.body: because you have a 14day ban that is a not a timer its to show you your ban length read the report card and it tells you when you get you account back
